require ‘rubygems’ unless ENV[‘NO_RUBYGEMS’] %w[rake rake/clean fileutils newgem rubigen].each { |f| require f } require File.dirname(FILE) + ‘/lib/rwikibot‘

# Generate all the Rake tasks # Run ‘rake -T’ to see list of generated tasks (from gem root directory) $hoe = Hoe.new(‘rwikibot’, RWikiBot::VERSION) do |p| 

  p.developer('Eddie Roger', 'eddieroger @nospam@ gmail.com')
  p.changes              = p.paragraphs_of("History.txt", 0..1).join("\n\n")
  p.rubyforge_name       = p.name
  p.extra_deps         = [
    'xmlsimple',
    'deep_merge'
  ]
  p.extra_dev_deps = [
    ['newgem', ">= #{::Newgem::VERSION}"]
  ]

  p.clean_globs |= %w[**/.DS_Store tmp *.log]
  path = (p.rubyforge_name == p.name) ? p.rubyforge_name : "\#{p.rubyforge_name}/\#{p.name}"
  p.remote_rdoc_dir = File.join(path.gsub(/^#{p.rubyforge_name}\/?/,''), 'rdoc')
  p.rsync_args = '-av --delete --ignore-errors'

end

require ‘newgem/tasks’ # load /tasks/*.rake Dir.each { |t| load t }

# TODO - want other tests/tasks run by default? Add them to the list # task :default => [:spec, :features]
